# Sahil Sait

> AI Software Engineer. MS CS candidate at San Jose State University, researching semantic routing for vision-language models. Previously SDE Intern at Amazon and Software Engineer at Amadeus IT Group. Based in San Jose, CA.

## Current

- MS in Computer Science at San Jose State University
- Graduate Research: Semantic routing for vision-language models using VLM2Vec embeddings

## Experience

- **Amazon** — Software Development Engineer Intern. Built features for accounting automation team — backend services on AWS Lambda and DynamoDB, React/TypeScript frontends.
- **Amadeus IT Group** — Software Engineer. Built observability infrastructure for distributed systems at global scale — platform reliability and monitoring.

## Skills

Python, Java, TypeScript, PyTorch, AWS, React, DynamoDB, Docker, Distributed Systems, Inference Optimization, Machine Learning

## Interests

AI Infrastructure, Inference Optimization, Semantic Routing, Vision-Language Models, VLM2Vec, CUDA Programming, Distributed Systems, Programmable Money, Longevity Research, Reinforcement Learning
